title.rendered: Body Transformation Company Ultimate Performance Appoints 3PL as its Omnichannel Fulfilment Partner

content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overflow=”visible” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” column_position=”default” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]WIGAN, 20th October 2022 – Ultimate Performance (U.P.), one of the world’s leading personal training companies, has announced a new partnership with omnichannel order fulfilment and logistics provider 3PL, that will see its range of fitness supplements shipped to health enthusiasts across the UK.

U.P. are globally recognised for their expertise in the science of body transformation and result-focused personal training. U.P. have private gyms that span across 4 continents and helped over 25,000 clients to improve their health and enhance their results with a range of products and services, including meal preparation, premium quality nutritional supplements, and books.

Mike Alty, Head of Retail at Ultimate Performance (U.P.), said: “We are absolutely delighted to be working with 3PL. Ultimate Performance has built its global reputation for being the pre-eminent personal training company in the world by putting the needs of our customers first. Whether it is personal training, nutrition, or taking supplements, our ethos is to give clients world-class service. Thanks to this exciting new partnership with 3PL, we can now deliver this standard of service to our UK and European shoppers. It is so important that companies understand the journey their customers go on when purchasing a product. By striking this partnership with 3PL, we can now offer anyone who wants to purchase our premium fitness supplements a premium shopping experience, right the way through from placing their orders online, to the moment it lands on their doorsteps.”

The partnership will take advantage of 3PL’s experience and industry expertise in eCommerce order fulfilment across the rapidly growing supplement and vitamin sector. By partnering with 3PL, Ultimate Performance will target continued brand growth and product accessibility across a range of platforms and channels by ensuring faster shipping, accurate packing and low-cost delivery.

“We are thrilled to be partnered with Ultimate Performance” Dan Wood, Business Development Manager at 3PL commented. “A fantastic business fully committed to transforming your body, your health and your life. The core values of honesty and integrity are very much aligned with ours here at 3PL. We look forward to being a part of Ultimate Performance Fitness’s growth and success along the way.”

 

About 3PL

Based in Wigan, 3PL offers omnichannel eCommerce fulfilment and logistics for growing brands. As an end-to-end fulfilment solution, 3PL operates from over 250,000 sq. ft of shared user warehousing in the UK, supported by access to a network of international warehouses to support global expansion for its clients. Its fast-moving operations house over 16 million items of stock, and dispatch across some 32,000 product lines. Learn more by visiting 3p-logistics.co.uk

About Ultimate Performance

Ultimate Performance (U.P.) was founded in 2009 in London by world-renowned personal trainer Nick Mitchell. Since then U.P. have invested in building an ecosystem of world-class trainers, cutting-edge data and systems of accountability that give its global clients a cast-iron blueprint for success. Learn more by visiting: uk.ultimateperformance.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
